channel.title: rewrite log on 吴丹阳

item.title: 如何调试nginx的rewrite规则?
item.description: 如何调试nginx的rewrite规则？ 设置 rewrite_log on; 并且将error_log 的报错等级改成 notice; 官网对 rewrite_log 的解释： 1 2 3 4 5 Syntax: rewrite_log on | off; Default: rewrite_log off; Context: http, server, location, if
